      • addScorePage

        public void addScorePage(java.io.File file)
        This adds a score page to this frame's GUI data. This method is meant to be invoked AFTER ProjectData.addScorePage(file). It keeps the GUI up to date with the data.
        Parameters:
        file -

      • removeScorePage

        public void removeScorePage(int index)
        This removes the score page at the specified index from the popup menu. Basically, this is a method that updates the GUI and must be invoked AFTER ProjectData.removeScorePage(index).
        Parameters:
        index -
